page.title: ADVISORY: Levi Strauss Story Withdrawn (Reuters)
page.text: Reuters - The story headlined "UPDATE 1-Levi\Strauss Co says could face bankruptcy" is withdrawn. The\story was based on language included in a filing the company\made with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. Such\language on risk factors is standard in most references to\indebtedness in regulatory filings by companies.
